## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                               | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | The Icon size. Possible values are: `"sm"`, `"md"`, `"lg"`, `"xl"` and size in pixel. Defaults to `"md"`. | `string` | `'md'`  |
